page.title: 11NATIONAL PARKS IN WHARFEDALE
page.content: The{Yorkshire Dales National Park {Committee}has identified five essential elements: {Landscape Character-}the visual identity of the landscape as distinct from its quality of beauty. {Scenic Beauty-}The quality of appearance of the landscape. {Cultural Heritage-}The man made attributes of the landscape which contribute to its beauty and its character and which in themselves have historic or cultural significance. {Wildlife}-The floral,faunal and ecological qualities of the landscape. {Peacefulness _}the qualities of tranquility and solitude of rural open space. {Promotion of Public Enjoyment - Quiet {Enjoyment -}Informal Recreation eg.Walking,Cycling,Caving,Climbing and Camping.
